And I still see no one being pulled out of his cult meetings for doing the things they are doing in the town halls of democrats that I’ve seen.  Maybe I’m biased.   Hate to say that because I think it’s a really a terrible situation but we had a chance to reduce the damage potential and failed, it’s only going to get worse and we still have people seemingly only going after one side.
